title: Altinn layout settings
description: Schema that describes settings for the layout configuration for Altinn applications.

hideCloseButton.title: Hide close button
hideCloseButton.description: Hide the close button in the upper right corner of the app

showLanguageSelector.title: Show language selector
showLanguageSelector.description: Show the language selector in the upper right corner of the app

showExpandWidthButton.title: Show expand width button
showExpandWidthButton.description: Show the expand width button in the upper right corner of the app

showProgress.title: Show progress indicator
showProgress.description: Enables a progress indicator in the upper right corner of the app (when on data tasks/forms)

autoSaveBehavior.title: Auto save behavior
autoSaveBehavior.description: An attribute specifying when the application will save form data. onChangeFormData saves on every interaction with form elements. onChangePage saves on every page change.

excludeFromPdf.title: Exclude from PDF
excludeFromPdf.description: List of components to exclude from the PDF generation

ILayoutSettings.title: Layout settings
ILayoutSettings.description: Settings regarding layout pages and components

receiptLayoutName.title: Receipt layout name
receiptLayoutName.description: DEPRECATED: Receipt layout name. This configuration setting will be moved so that custom receipts can work when reloading the page.

order.title: Page order
order.description: List of pages in the order they should appear in the application

excludeFromPdf.title: Exclude from PDF
excludeFromPdf.description: List of pages to exclude from the PDF generation

pdfLayoutName.title: PDF layout name
pdfLayoutName.description: Name of a custom layout file to use for PDF creation instead of the automatically generated PDF.
